entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Kakabeka Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:34 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -12.0°C

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
